changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text.
changelog.md.Ajout d'une commande pour savoir si l'am: Addition of an order to know if the bulb is reachable or not
changelog.md.Ajout d'image pour les ampoules génériqu: Addition of image for generic bulbs
changelog.md.Correction de la remise à 0 de l'état de: Correction of resetting the lamp state to 0 when it is turned back on
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton pour supprimer une com: Add a button to delete an order
changelog.md.Correction des configuration pour les am: Correction of the configuration for the ikea bulbs (attention you must remove them from jeedom and redo a synchronization)
changelog.md.Support du retour d'état des prise OSRAM: Support for OSRAM SMART socket status feedback (attention requires reinclusion)
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton de synchronisation sur: Add a synchronization button on the equipment management page
changelog.md.Ajout de configuration de lumière géneri: Addition of color and non-color generic light configuration
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'état des bouto: Correction of a bug on the state of the buttons when restarting the bridge
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'invertion de p: Correction of a bug on the inversion of presence for the motion sensor (for those already created it will be necessary to tick the inversion cache on the line of the Presence command)
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le statut des pi: Correction of a bug on the status of the pieces (on / off) if there is no color lamp in it
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'heure des vale: Correction of a bug on the time of the sensor values
changelog.md.Passage sur le nouveau système de doc: Switch to the new doc system
changelog.md.Ajout du modèle TRADFRI bulb GU10 W 400l: Addition of the TRADFRI bulb GU10 W 400lm model
changelog.md.Ajout d'animation (levé et couché de sol: Addition of animation (sunrise and sunset), be careful all

index.md.Plugin pour s'integrer à l'écosysteme Ph: Plugin to integrate into the Philips Hue ecosystem
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il vous: After downloading the plugin, you will need to enter the IP address of your hue bridge, if not already done by the automatic discovery system
index.md.Vous aurez toujours un équipement \"Tout: You will always have "All lamps" equipment which actually corresponds to group 0 which exists all the time
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.les catégories de l'équipement (il peut: equipment categories (it can belong to several categories)
index.md.rend votre équipement visible sur le das: makes your equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.En-dessous vous retrouvez la liste des c: Below you find the list of orders
index.md.le nom affiché sur le dashboard: the name displayed on the dashboard
index.md.permet d'afficher la fenetre de configur: displays the command's advanced configuration window
index.md.vous permet d'afficher ou de masquer cer: allows you to display or hide certain commands and / or log them
index.md.Le groupe 0 est un peu particulier car i: Group 0 is a bit special because it cannot be deleted or modified, it necessarily drives all the lamps and it is also it that carries the scenes
index.md.En effet vous pouvez faire des \"scenes\: Indeed you can make "scenes" on Philips Hue
index.md.Celle-ci doivent absolument être faite à: These must absolutely be done from the mobile application (impossible to do them in Jeedom)
index.md.Et suite à l'ajout d'une scene vous deve: And following the addition of a scene you must absolutely synchronize Jeedom with the correct one (by simply saving the configuration of the plugin)
index.md.Commande un peu particulier qui doit êtr: Command a little particular which must be used in a scenario, it makes it possible to say the transition between the current state and the next command must duration X seconds
index.md.Par exemple le matin vous pouvez vouloir: For example in the morning you may want to simulate the sunrise in 3 minutes
index.md.Dans votre scénario vous avez donc juste: In your scenario you therefore just have to call the transition command and in parameter set 180, then call the color command towards the desired color
index.md.Les animations sont des enchainements de: The animations are transition sequences, currently there are
index.md.Il peut prendre en parametre: It can take as a parameter
index.md.pour definir la durée, par defaut 720s,: to define the duration, by default 720s, ex for 5min you have to put
index.md.Voici la liste des code pour les boutons: Here is the list of codes for the buttons
index.md.La même chose avec XXX0 pour la touche a: The same with XXX0 for the key pressed, XXX1 for the key held and XXX2 for the key released
index.md.Voici les séquence pour le bouton On par: Here are the sequences for the On button for example
index.md.Lors de l'appui on passe sur 1000 et qua: When pressed we go to 1000 and when we release we go to 1002
index.md.Lors de l'appui on passe sur 1000, duran: During the press we pass on 1000, during the press we pass on 1001, when we release we pass on 1002
index.md.J'ai l'impression qu'il y a un décalage: I have the impression that there is a difference in certain color between what I ask and the color of the bulb
index.md.Il semble que la grille de couleur des a: It seems that the color grid of the bulbs has an offset, we are looking for how to correct
index.md.Mon équipement (lampe\/interrupteur....): My equipment (lamp / switch ....) is not recognized by the plugin, how to do
index.md.nous d'écrire l'équipement que vous voul: write us the equipment you want to add with photo and possibilities of it - send us the log debug of synchronization with the bridge while contacting us with a support request
